page_description: Our commitment to digital accessibility and WCAG compliance
statement_subtitle: We dey committed to make Wellio accessible for everybody
title: Accessibility Statement
commitment_text: Wellio dey committed to ensure digital accessibility for people wey get disability.
standards_text: We dey aim to comply with WCAG 2.1 Level AA guidelines.
keyboard_nav_desc: Full support for navigation using keyboard only.
focus_indicators_desc: Clear visual focus indicators for interactive elements.
alt_text_desc: All images include descriptive alternative text.
assistive_text: Wellio dey designed to work with assistive technologies.
feedback_text: If you encounter accessibility barriers, abeg contact us.
ongoing_text: We dey continuously work to improve accessibility.
